article_title: Penn State changes benefits policy for same-sex couples
article_text: Rainbow flags waved across the nation on June 26 when the Supreme Court legalized same-sex marriage. At Penn State, the decision led to a change in employee benefits — and possibly to some wedding plans.

article_metadata.title: Penn State changes benefits policy for same-sex couples | Centre Daily Times
